TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HtmlDocument extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供对 控件承载的 HTML 文档的顶级编程访问。

span.span: Provides top-level programmatic access to an HTML document hosted by the control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供了围绕 Internet Explorer 文档对象（也称为 HTML 文档对象模型（DOM））的托管包装。 provides a managed wrapper around Internet Explorer's document object, also known as the HTML Document Object Model (DOM). 通过 控件的 属性获取 的实例。You obtain an instance of through the property of the control. HTML 文档中的 HTML 标记可以相互嵌套。HTML tags inside of an HTML document can be nested inside one another. 因此 表示一个文档树，其子级是 类的实例。 thus represents a document tree, whose children are instances of the class. 下面的代码示例演示一个简单的 HTML 文件。The following code example shows a simple HTML file. ```
Simple HTML Form
Enter Your Name:
``` 在此示例中， 表示 `HTML` 标记中的整个文档。In this example, represents the entire document inside the `HTML` tags. `BODY`、`DIV`、`FORM` 和 `SPAN` 标记由单个 对象表示。The `BODY`, `DIV`, `FORM` and `SPAN` tags are represented by individual objects. 可以通过多种方式访问此树中的元素。There are several ways you can access the elements in this tree. 使用 属性访问 `BODY` 标记及其所有子级。Use the property to access the `BODY` tag and all of its children. 属性为 HTML 页面上具有用户输入焦点的元素提供了 。The property gives you the for the element on an HTML page that has user input focus. HTML 页面中的所有元素都可以具有名称; 集合使用其名称作为索引提供对每个 的访问。All elements within an HTML page can have a name; the collection provides access to each using its name as an index. 将使用给定的 HTML 标记名称（例如 `DIV` 或 `TABLE`）返回所有 对象的 。 will return an of all objects with a given HTML tag name, such as `DIV` or `TABLE`. 将返回对应于你提供的唯一 ID 的单个 。 will return the single corresponding to the unique ID that you supply. 将返回可在屏幕上提供的鼠标指针坐标处找到的 。 will return the that can be found on the screen at the supplied mouse pointer coordinates. 你还可以使用 和 集合分别循环访问表示用户输入窗体和图形的元素。You can also use the and collection to iterate through elements that represent user input forms and graphics, respectively. 基于 Internet Explorer 的 DHTML DOM 实现的非托管接口： `IHTMLDocument`、`IHTMLDocument2`、`IHTMLDocument3`和 `IHTMLDocument4`。 is based on the unmanaged interfaces implemented by Internet Explorer's DHTML DOM: `IHTMLDocument`, `IHTMLDocument2`, `IHTMLDocument3`, and `IHTMLDocument4`. 仅公开这些非托管接口上最常用的属性和方法。Only the most frequently used properties and methods on these unmanaged interfaces are exposed by . 您可以使用 属性（可将其强制转换为所需的非托管接口指针）直接访问所有其他属性和方法。You can access all other properties and methods directly using the property, which you can cast to the desired unmanaged interface pointer. HTML 文档可以包含框架，框架是 控件内的不同窗口。An HTML document may contain frames, which are different windows inside of the control. 每个帧都显示其自己的 HTML 页面。Each frame displays its own HTML page. 集合通过 属性提供。The collection is available through the property. 你还可以使用 "" 属性调整所显示页面的大小，滚动文档，或者向用户显示警报和提示。You may also use the property to resize the displayed page, scroll the document, or display alerts and prompts to the user. 公开托管 HTML 页面时应处理的最常见事件。 exposes the most common events you would expect to handle when hosting HTML pages. 对于不是由接口直接公开的事件，可以使用 为事件添加处理程序。For events not exposed directly by the interface, you can add a handler for the event using . HTML 文件可能包含 `SCRIPT` 标记，这些标记封装用一种活动脚本语言（如 JScript 或 VBScript）编写的代码。HTML files may contain `SCRIPT` tags that encapsulate code written in one of the Active Scripting languages, such as JScript or VBScript. 方法提供 `SCRIPT` 标记中定义的属性和方法的执行。The method provides for execution of properties and methods defined in a `SCRIPT` tag. > [!NOTE] > 尽管 上的大多数属性、方法和事件都与其在非托管 DOM 上具有相同的名称，但某些属性、方法和事件已更改，以便与 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]保持一致。While most of the properties, methods, and events on have kept the same names as they have on the unmanaged DOM, some have been changed for consistency with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Northwind 数据库中的数据，以动态方式使用 创建 `HTML TABLE`。The following code example uses data from the Northwind database to create an `HTML TABLE` dynamically using . 还使用 方法，即首先将单元格（`TD` 元素）添加到行（`TR` 元素），然后向表中添加行，最后将表追加到当前文档的末尾。The method is also used, first to add cells (`TD` elements) to rows (`TR` elements), then to add rows to the table, and finally to append the table to the end of the current document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序具有一个名为 `WebBrowser1`的 控件。The code example requires that your application has a control named `WebBrowser1`. 加载文档后应调用该代码。The code should be called after a document has been loaded. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果文档具有焦点，但没有为文档提供焦点，则 返回与 `` 标记对应的元素。When the document has focus, but no element of the document has been given focus, returns the element corresponding to the `` tag. 如果该文档不具有焦点， 将返回 `null`。If the document does not have focus, returns `null`. 如果具有输入焦点的当前元素是 HTML `TABLE` 标记中的单元格（`TD`）， 将返回包含 `TABLE` 元素的元素。If the current element with input focus is a cell (`TD`) in an HTML `TABLE` tag, will return the element that contains the `TABLE` element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合提供对 HTML 文档中的任何元素的随机访问，而不考虑其在文档树中的位置。The collection provides random access to any element in the HTML document, regardless of its position in the document tree. 使用它按名称、ID 或索引访问 HTML 文档中的任何元素。Use it to access any element in an HTML document by name, ID, or index. 您还可以循环访问文档中的所有元素。You may also iterate over all of the elements within a document. 某些元素（如 `HEAD` 和 `TITLE`）将永远不会有与其关联的名称。Some elements, such as `HEAD` and `TITLE`, will never have names associated with them. 所有其他元素仅在 HTML 文件的作者分配了名称时才具有名称。All other elements will have names only if the author of the HTML file assigned them. 可以通过 ID 或索引访问元素，而无需名称。You can access elements without names by ID or index. 不能将元素直接添加到 集合，因为 `HTML` 标记之外的 HTML 文件中的所有元素都必须具有父元素。You cannot add elements directly to the collection, because all elements in an HTML file outside of the `HTML` tag must have a parent element. 使用 上的 方法或 属性将新元素添加到树中。Use the method or the property on to add new elements to the tree. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将循环访问文档中的所有元素，并设置 `Enabled=True`，并启用默认情况下已禁用的任何元素，以防止用户在加载文档时进行输入。The following code example iterates through all of the elements in a document and sets `Enabled=True`, enabling any elements that may have been disabled by default to prevent user input while the document was loading. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序包含一个名为 `WebBrowser1` 控件。The code example requires that your application contains a control named `WebBrowser1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 在文档完成加载之前，不应将事件附加到文档或其对象之一。You should not attach an event to the document or one of its objects until the document has completed loading. 应最早调用此方法的是 控件的 事件。The earliest you should call this method is in the event of the control. 此方法允许您将处理程序附加到未由 公开的非托管 DOM 事件。This method allows you to attach handlers to unmanaged DOM events not exposed by . 有关可用的非托管 DOM 事件的详细信息，请参阅[访问托管 HTML 文档对象模型](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model)和 IHTMLDocument 接口上的未公开成员： [IHTMLDocument](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882)、 [IHTMLDocument2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884)、 [IHTMLDocument3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886)、 [IHTMLDocument4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887)、 [IHTMLDocument5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888)。For more information about available unmanaged DOM events, see [Accessing Unexposed Members on the Managed HTML Document Object Model](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/accessing-unexposed-members-on-the-managed-html-document-object-model) and the IHTMLDocument interfaces: [IHTMLDocument](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104882), [IHTMLDocument2](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104884), [IHTMLDocument3](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104886), [IHTMLDocument4](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104887), [IHTMLDocument5](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=104888).

remarks.format: ## Remarks HTML 文档分为两个主要部分：An HTML document is split into two major sections: - `HEAD`，其中包含文档的标题、任何文档元数据和 `SCRIPT` 元素。`HEAD`, which contains the document's title, any document meta-data, and `SCRIPT` elements. - `BODY`，其中包含文档的屏幕外观所涉及的所有元素。`BODY`, which contains all of the elements involved in the on-screen appearance of the document. 上没有等效的 `Head` 属性。There is no equivalent `Head` property on . 若要获取 `HEAD` 元素，请使用 。To obtain the `HEAD` element, use . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个新的 `DIV` 元素，并使用 方法将其追加到文档的底部。The following code example creates a new `DIV` element and appends it to the bottom of the document using the method. span.span: Gets or sets the HTTP cookies associated with this document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的 属性公开为网页设置的所有 cookie。The property of exposes all cookies set for a Web page. *Cookie*是与给定网页相关联的任意名称/值对。A *cookie* is an arbitrary name/value pair associated with a given Web page. Web 开发人员使用 cookie 跟踪用户何时访问或返回到网站。Web developers use cookies to track when users visit or return to a Web site. Cookie 由多个部件组成，称为 cookie crumb，用于确定以下各项：A cookie is composed of multiple parts, called cookie crumbs, that determine the following: - Cookie 应用于的文档集;其域和路径。The document set to which the cookie applies; its domain and path. - Cookie 的名称和值。The name and value of the cookie. - Cookie 的到期日期。The expiration date of the cookie. - 是否只能使用安全连接发送 cookie。Whether the cookie can only be sent using a secure connection. 属性可能包含多个 cookie。The property may contain multiple cookies. 一次只能使用 属性设置一个 cookie。You can only use the property to set one cookie at a time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `elementTag` 可以是 Internet Explorer 中任何受支持的 HTML 标记之一（`FRAME` 或 `IFRAME`除外）。`elementTag` may be one of any of the supported HTML tags in Internet Explorer, except for `FRAME` or `IFRAME`. 返回一个未附加到当前文档树的元素。 returns an element unattached to the current document tree. 若要将元素添加到文档中，请使用 或 方法。To add the element to the document, use either the or methods. 当你使用 控件的**视图源**上下文菜单命令或 控件的 和 属性时，此方法不会影响现有文档的源代码的状态。This method will not affect the state of an existing document's source code when you use the control's **View Source** context menu command or the and properties of the control. 在 创建新元素时，将无法设置某些属性，如 `Name`。When you create new elements with , you will not be able to set certain properties, such as `Name`. 在需要设置名称属性的情况下，请将它们以 HTML 格式分配给文档中其他对象的 属性。In cases where you need to set the Name attribute, assign them as HTML to the property of another object in the document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 Northwind 数据库中的数据创建使用 的 HTML 表。The following code example uses data from the Northwind database to create an HTML table using . 还使用 方法，即首先将单元格（`TD` 元素）添加到行（`TR` 元素），然后向表中添加行，最后将表追加到当前文档的末尾。The method is also used, first to add cells (`TD` elements) to rows (`TR` elements), then to add rows to the table, and finally to append the table to the end of the current document. 此代码示例要求你的应用程序具有一个名为 `WebBrowser1` 控件。The code example requires that your application has a control called `WebBrowser1`. member this.Domain : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置字符串，描述用于安全目的的此文档的域。

span.span: Gets or sets the string describing the domain of this document for security purposes.
A valid domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，不同框架中的两个网页将无法使用脚本访问彼此的内容;即使 `www.microsoft.com` 和 `docs.microsoft.com`，在此实例中也被视为不同的域。By default, two Web pages in different frames are prevented from accessing each other's content using script; even `www.microsoft.com` and `docs.microsoft.com` are, in this instance, considered different domains. 若要为同一顶级域中的页面启用跨框架脚本，可以为 属性指定新值。To enable cross-frame scripting for pages from the same top-level domain, you can assign a new value to the property. 在前面的 URL 示例中，将 设置为 microsoft.com 将允许两个页面彼此通信。In the previous URL example, setting to microsoft.com would allow both pages to communicate with one another. 分配给 属性的字符串必须是有效的顶级域。Strings assigned to the property must be valid top-level domains. 在上一个 URL 示例中，可以将 设置为 microsoft.com，但不能设置为 .com，这会使 Internet 上的任何页面都能够为页面内容编写脚本。In the previous URL example, you can set to microsoft.com, but not to .com, which would enable any page on the Internet to script a page's contents. 不能使用 属性启用跨框架脚本，以便使用两个不同的协议访问的页面。You cannot use the property to enable cross-frame scripting for pages accessed using two different protocols. 如果页面中的一帧来自 Web 服务器（http://协议），另一帧来自文件系统（file://）协议，则无论 属性的值如何，它们都不能彼此通信。If one frame in your page comes from a Web server (the http:// protocol) and another comes from the file system (the file://) protocol, they will not be able to communicate with one another regardless of the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的对象的基础类型将有所不同。The underlying type of the object returned by will vary. 如果调用的活动脚本函数返回标量数据（如字符串或整数），则它将作为字符串返回。If the called Active Scripting function returns scalar data, such as a string or an integer, it will be returned as a string. 如果它返回基于脚本的对象（如使用 JScript 或 VBScript `new` 运算符创建的对象），则其类型为 `Object`。If it returns a script-based object, such as an object created using JScript or VBScript's `new` operator, it will be of type `Object`. （可以通过调用 并使用 对此类对象进行调用。）如果它返回一个 HTML DOM 元素（例如 `DIV` 或 `TABLE`），则它将为 `Object`类型;如果已向 MSHTML 添加项目引用，则为。但 DLL 会转换为其特定的非托管 DOM 类型。(You can make calls on such objects by calling and using .) If it returns an HTML DOM element, such as a `DIV` or a `TABLE`, it will be of type `Object`; if you have added a project reference to MSHTML.DLL, however, it will be cast to its specific unmanaged DOM type. 您可以调用在用户计算机上安装的任何活动脚本语言（包括 JScript 和 VBScript）编写的任何函数。You may call any function written in any Active Scripting language installed on the user's machine, including JScript and VBScript. 如果用户已在 Internet Explorer 中显式关闭脚本执行，或者如果网页的当前安全配置不允许，则此方法不会执行任何操作。This method will do nothing if the user has explicitly turned off script execution in Internet Explorer, or if the current security configuration for the Web page does not allow it. ## Examples 下面的代码示例执行网页中的脚本的内容。The following code example executes the contents of a script in a Web page. 此代码示例要求你在应用程序中有一个名为 `WebBrowser1`的 ，并且已加载以下网页。The code example requires that you have a in your application called `WebBrowser1`, and that you have loaded the following Web page. ``` ``` [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/CS/Form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HtmlDocument/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
